verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: is] expected home from the hospital in a few days after receiving treatment this week for a kidney condition that is noncancerous .
Melania Trump is [V: expected] [ARG1: home from the hospital] [ARGM-TMP: in a few days] [ARGM-TMP: after receiving treatment this week for a kidney condition that is noncancerous] .
[ARG0: Melania Trump] is expected home from the hospital in a few days after [V: receiving] [ARG1: treatment] [ARGM-TMP: this week] [ARGM-PRP: for a kidney condition that is noncancerous] .
Melania Trump is expected home from the hospital in a few days after receiving treatment this week for [ARG1: a kidney condition] [R-ARG1: that] [V: is] [ARG2: noncancerous] .
